body_html: Based on reading the code, I think it is expected: there is not yet support for SparseTensors with those three optimizers, since _apply_sparse() function isn't implemented. Turning this into a feature request.

body: Based on reading the code, I think it is expected: there is not yet support for SparseTensors with those three optimizers, since _apply_sparse() function isn't implemented.  Turning this into a feature request.
